channel.title: Sites Job Chicago on Writing by Harper Reed

item.title: Chicago.. The final Frontier
item.description: WhooHoo So i am in chicago now. It is noce. I have a rather bomb apartment. All x10’d out. Its nice. I am still dating th elovely and magnificant K*STar. It is wonderful. My job is working out well - i wish i made more money.. hehe.. I had to buy a new monitor, damn.. a 19” one at that.. heh.. its nice however. things are going well. i am lonly sometimes.
